data.comment: The match has started, with Liege kicking-off.
Abdoul Tapsoba (Liege) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 36, Liege make their first substitution with Duje Cop replacing Jackson Muleka.
Selim Amallah (Liege) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The first half has been concluded at Stade du Pays de Charleroi.
In the minute 46, The second-half has commenced. Charleroi with the kick-off.
Shamar Nicholson (Charleroi) has received a yellow card from Lawrence Visser.
Modou Diagne is on a sub for Steeven Willems for Charleroi.
In the minute 60, Michel Ange Balikwisha is replacing Abdoul Tapsoba for the away team.
Liege's Zinho Vanheusden has been booked in Charleroi.
Goal! Liege have got their heads in front thanks to a Michel Ange Balikwisha strike.
In the minute 84, Nicolas Raskin puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
The home team have replaced Ali Gholizadeh with Ken Nkuba. This is the second substitution made today by Karim Belhocine.
Karim Belhocine (Charleroi) is making a third substitution, with David Henen replacing Guillaume Gillet.
In the minute 87, Charleroi are back in the match in Charleroi. Mamadou Fall has scored to make it 1-2.
Eden Shamir is replacing Selim Amallah for Liege at Stade du Pays de Charleroi.
Marco Ilaimaharitra for Charleroi has been booked by Lawrence Visser and receives a first yellow card.
Lawrence Visser blows to end the match. The final score is 1-2.
